reviewText: How can you not love movies with Julia Roberts?  I had only seen 2 of these 4 movies, and was glad I got these 4 disks as the other 2 were great, too.
Haven't had a chance to watch yet . But J.R. without commercials is  going  be great

i give this 4 pack  5 stars.  i purchased it for notting hill and erin brokovich.  i have seen these movies so far.  i don't know much else about the other 2 yet.  i will soon.  i am a fan of Ms. Roberts.  and the fairy tale of notting hill makes me tear up each and every time i see it.  i don't know the dialogue quite yet.  i may never but i can watch this film over and over.  as for erin  brokovich its a great true story and the real erin makes a brief cameo as a waitress. i never knew that before.  but this time i let the credits roll and found that out. great story albert finny is superb.  and it is a real feel good ending.
Excellent Service and Product as listed.  Thank you.
I received four movies for the price of one. This is a great deal. I love Julia Robert movies she is great.
Great! But what can you say about a very good actress in 3 out of 4 VERY good films? That aint battin' bad.
If you love lots of badwords, this DVD is for you!  Cheap DVD has no Closed Captioning so your Cuss Blocker (TV Guardian) will not work.
Arrived on time and as described. Really good deal.
I love all of Julia Roberts movies.
erin brockovich is very realistic. its 1 of my favorite all time movies.
Charlie Wilson's War was well done and very entertaining.
